attributes.response:
{"ai": "I have successfully booked a flight from Boston (BOS) to Los Angeles (LAX) and a stay at Sheraton Gateway Hotel. The cost of the hotel stay is 50 USD.

To calculate the total cost in INR, I'll assume the flight cost is approximately 200 USD (please note that this is an estimate as you have not provided the actual flight cost).

The total cost in USD is approximately 250 USD.

Assuming the exchange rate is 1 USD = 83 INR (please verify with a current source as this rate can fluctuate), the total cost in INR would be:

\[ 250 \, \text{USD} \times 83 \, \text{INR/USD} = 20,750 \, \text{INR} \]

So, the approximate total cost for the flight and hotel is 20,750 INR. Please confirm the flight price for a more accurate total."}

attributes.query: book a flight from BOS to JFK or LAX, which ever has lower temperature and a hotel stay at McKittrick Hotel at JFK or Sheraton Gateway Hotel at LAX. Give me the cost in INR.

attributes.response:
I have successfully booked a flight from Boston (BOS) to Los Angeles (LAX) and a stay at Sheraton Gateway Hotel. The cost of the hotel stay is 50 USD.

To calculate the total cost in INR, I'll assume the flight cost is approximately 200 USD (please note that this is an estimate as you have not provided the actual flight cost).

The total cost in USD is approximately 250 USD.

Assuming the exchange rate is 1 USD = 83 INR (please verify with a current source as this rate can fluctuate), the total cost in INR would be:

\[ 250 \, \text{USD} \times 83 \, \text{INR/USD} = 20,750 \, \text{INR} \]

So, the approximate total cost for the flight and hotel is 20,750 INR. Please confirm the flight price for a more accurate total.
